name: Peaceful Ebay dark
description: A nice dark ebay with amber text. White text in text fields, and buttons.

display:none;
}
#rtm_iframe_184
Div#rtm_html_184[class=topBannerAd]{display:none !important; visibility:hidden !important;}
*{background-color:#202020 !important; color:#ffffff;}
body,
body a{
background-color:#404040 !important; 
color:#ffffff !important;
}
 #_nkw_id_acdiv{

Color:#ffffff;
}
